I recently purchased leEco 2. It is a good one till now. I don't have any issue with the mobile but I do have an issue with the delivery, especially the delivery boy. I asked delivery boy to deliver it at around 6 to 7 pm, I was not present at the mentioned address at that time. He talked arrogantly and asked me to cancel the order. So snapdeal should take care of such cases.

Just buy & fell the luxury

The phone fulfil all your daily requirements, whether it is entertainment or daily usage.
It will easily last for a day if you are moderate user. 
Camera will disappoint you in low light but still be satisfactory if you are not a photographer...just use 3rd party app and it will be fine.
Pros
-it has 652 Snapdragon processor which is amazingly fast. Gaming is very smooth and you can easily play high graphic game with no frame drops.
-display is very crisp and screen size is big enough for movies and games.
-dolby atmos enhances sound quality and is perfect for listening songs.
-built quility is awesome.it looks very premium and equally durable. Gorilla glass is very much durable and scratch free. 
-finger print sensor is perfect.
-ir blaster works well.(not very useful feature)
-its eui os is nice but little different from others..you can download Google launcher instead for better experience of ui

Cons
-again camera in low light 
-battery backup (heavy users).
-3.5 audio jack is missing.
.....
Bottom line:its pros makes this phone better than redmi note 3 and even note 4.
